page.title: 14LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: A survey carried out among children and adults in Aviemore show that {sports and sports-related activities are the most popular forms of leisure and recreation in this area probably because the Aviemore Holiday Centre provides many excellent facilities for both participant and spectator sports. One sport enjoyed by many people in the area is Ice Hockey.The local team, {Aviemore Blackhawks}(named after a famous US team Chicago Blackhawks)was established about 10 years ago and has recently won the Scottish Section of the Second Division and was runner-up in the British section.The team plays about 20 league matches per season and trains twice weekly.Their success has increased interest in the sport and a junior team has recently been established.
